content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    AVG(TipAmount) as Average, STDEV(TipAmount) as [stdev], MAX(TipAmount) as [MaxTip], AVG(TipAmount)+STDEV(TipAmount) [top], AVG(TipAmount)-STDEV(TipAmount) [bottom], COUNT(*) [Count], PassengerCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://jmsynapsewsvigdow6zstg.dfs.core.windows.net/jmsynapsewsfs/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE PassengerCount>0
GROUP BY PassengerCount
ORDER BY PassengerCount DESC
